pages.text:
About the Roof
Tin Roof is about giving musicians a place to play and a place to hang when they aren’t on stage. The tasty food, fun, eclectic environment, community of Regulars and friendly Crew helped quickly establish Tin Roof as the place to be for musicians and non-musicians alike. Over the years, our stages have hosted the famous, the should have been famous, and everyone in between.
LOCATION & DIRECTIONS
We are located at
8371 International Drive
at
Icon Park, home of the Orlando Eye
featuring great restaurants, shops, nightlife, and much more!
GET DIRECTIONS TO TIN ROOF AT ICON PARK IN ORLANDO
DRINK! DANCE! REPEAT!
Tin Roof features two sides of entertainment, our original side & the
Green Room
, each with their own stage, bar, patio & more! Enjoy two sides of entertainment for one amazing good time all connected via an outdoor patio with great views of beautiful Icon Park and its attractions!  Check out our original side & our new Green Room for the best entertainment in Orlando!
Contact
JohnPatton@tinroofbars.com
for entertainment booking
VIEW LIVE MUSIC & ENTERTAINMENT CALENDAR
OUR CHEFS ROCK AS MUCH AS OUR MUSICIANS
Open from lunch to late night serving up our amazingly tasty ‘Better Than Bar Food’ menu! Menu highlights include hand breaded Chicken Tenders with house made sauces, the best Wings in Orlando, smash burgers & more!
VIEW FOOD MENU
Catch the Game at Tin Roof
Tons of TV’s & tasty food make the Roof a great game watch spot for your favorite team! Lots of seating options so great for groups of all sizes.
GROUP PARTIES & EVENTS
Besides offering a great time & best in class entertainment, both the Tin Roof & Green Room are great for hosting group events & parties!
Contact
Melina@tinroofbars.com
for details.
So whether you’re coming for the tunes, the food, a drink or just a good time, enjoy the Roof, ‘Where Everybody is Somebody’! Support live music and the musicians who bring it to us, and we hope we’ll see ya enough to call you a Regular!
SEE YA AT THE ROOF! OPEN DAILY FROM LUNCH TO LATE NIGHT!
CONTACT Us
8371 International Dr Orlando, FL 32819
Hours: Monday-Friday 12PM-2am  Saturday-Sunday 11am-2am
Phone:
689-220-0014
infoorlando@tinroofbars.com

View All Our Locations

GROUP PARTIES & EVENTS
GROUP EVENT
Bring your group to Tin Roof!  We are Located at ICON Park, convenient to the Convention Center and so much more. Our space is 11,800 square feet with two great spaces to hold up to 800 guests. Tin Roof has a scratch kitchen, no microwaves in house, with a fun, eclectic menu. Let us customize the perfect food, beverage, and entertainment package to make your event fun & amazing.  With LCD digital monitors throughout, 2-10’ projection screens, 2 full professional stages, sound & lighting packages, branding is made simple ensuring each event is unique for you and your guests.  Have more guests? Ask about our Block Party capabilities on the Lawn!
BOOK YOUR EVENT
TIN ROOF 360 TOUR
GREEN ROOM 360 TOUR
Download Event Menu
FAQ
CORPORATE EVENTS
HOST YOUR CORPORATE GROUP AT THE ROOF!
Tin Roof is the perfect fun spot for a corporate outing and a great party spot after your day at the Convention Center!
Request INformation
SOCIAL & WEDDING EVENTS
CELEBRATE AT THE ROOF!
Whether you are hosting a birthday, graduation, reunion, wedding celebration or any small group ready to party big, Tin Roof is the place to celebrate from brunch to late night!
Request Information
TOUR & TRAVEL GROUPS
BRING YOUR BUSES!
Let us customize the perfect menu for your group! Tin Roof is the place to stop for great food & drinks for lunch or dinner!
Request INformation
VIP COCKTAIL TOWER PACKAGE
ELEVATE YOUR NIGHT AT TIN ROOF!
Looking to add a touch of VIP excitement to your evening? Book a late night VIP table at Tin Roof and indulge in the ultimate experience with our NEW VIP Cocktail Tower package!
